about_the_game:
This software is a graphics pack containing 30 exciting monster design sprites created to the specifications of RPG Maker MZ and RPG Maker MV.

There are more than 10 different color variants and a total of 786 monster assets – allowing you to pick between regular and large sizes.
Monster variants can be used at all gameplay stages as regular monsters, medium-difficulty bosses, and final battle bosses.

The detailed designs and rich colors of the monsters will add exciting flavors to your game!

Contents
Enemies；30 sprites (more than 10 color variations, a total of 786 enemy graphic assets including 2 different sizes)

---

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
